tool_description:
Fetch any Indian Vehicle's Information through it's Registration Number/License Plate.
This API can fetch:-
[+] Owner Name
[+] Owner's Father Name
[+] Owner's Permanent & Current Address
[+] Vehicle Details
[+] Financer Details
[+] Permit & Insurance Details
[+] NOC Details
.......And Much More

Tags: Parivahan mParivahan Vehicle Info RC Details India Car Info Car Info RC database
name: Vehicle RC Information
title: Vehicle RC Information

api_list.name: Vehicle Information v2 [Advance]
api_list.description:
Fetch Vehicle Information using Registration Number.

--! Owner Mobile Number Added
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-rc-information.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-rc-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-rc-information.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-rc-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
